snippet: In his final season, relief pitcher Mariano Rivera is taking a behind-the-scenes tour to meet some fans and employees, who drive the machinery of baseball.
abstract: New York Yankees closer Mariano Rivera, in his final season, is taking behind-the-scenes tour to meet and show appreciation for fans and employees who drive the machinery of baseball; since announcing his retirement at end of 2013 season, Rivera has become an emissary of good will, penetrating enemy lines and unintentionally becoming the Yankees most successful ambassador since Babe Ruth.
lead_paragraph: In his final season, relief pitcher Mariano Rivera is taking a behind-the-scenes tour to meet some fans and employees, who drive the machinery of baseball.

headline.main: Yankees’ Rivera Spends His Goodbye Tour Saying Hello
headline.print_headline: A Most Likable Yankee Spends His Goodbye Tour Saying Hello
